name: DocumentHash
description: ID of the Document record, calculated as to_base64(sha1(PublicationTime + Text))

name: DocumentCollectionId
description: ID of the source document collection, if known.

name: CollectionItemId
description: Original ID in the source document collection, if known.

name: cntWRs
description: Number of URLs that reposted the original news story (document).

name: cntDomains
description: Number of news publisher domains reposting the original news story (document).

name: cntFb
description: Number of Facebook actions (likes, comments) across all web resources reposting the original news story (document).

name: Domains
description: News publisher domains reposting the original news story (document).

name: Urls
description: Web resources reposting the original news story (document).
